citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on
03-Oct-17.
The inspector arrived to the facility with the gate locked. She called the number on file and left voicemail messages
on the two phone numbers provided. The manager did not return the phone calls. The inspector waited 40 minutes
in front of the facility before leaving.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on
03-Oct-17.
The inspector arrived to the facility with the gate locked. She called the number on file and left voicemail messages
on the two phone numbers provided. The manager did not return the phone calls. The inspector waited 40 minutes
in front of the facility before leaving.
